findings.title: Skill does not specify a license
findings.description: Skill manifest does not include a 'license' field. Specifying a license helps users understand usage terms.
findings.remediation: Add 'license' field to SKILL.md frontmatter (e.g., MIT, Apache-2.0)

findings.title: Python scripts present but Python tool not in allowed-tools
findings.description: Skill restricts tools to ['Read', 'Write', 'StrReplace', 'Shell', 'Glob'] but includes Python scripts
findings.remediation: Add 'Python' to allowed-tools or remove Python scripts

findings.title: Code uses search/grep patterns but Grep tool not in allowed-tools
findings.description: Skill restricts tools to ['Read', 'Write', 'StrReplace', 'Shell', 'Glob'] but code uses regex search patterns
findings.remediation: Add 'Grep' to allowed-tools or remove regex search operations

findings.title: CODE EXECUTION detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects dangerous code execution patterns in agent skills (Python/Bash): " | python
findings.remediation: Review and remove code execution pattern
